name: Topics in Contemporary Art and Theory
description: An in-depth examination of a topic in contemporary art and/or theory. Topics vary from year to year, and the content in any given year depends upon the instructor. A seminar course limited to 20 students. [24S]
prerequisites: FAH101H5/FAH105H5/FAH202H5, FAH288H5/FAH289H5 and 1.0 in FAH or VCC at the 300/400 level
exclusions: None. Although equivalent courses are on the books at St. George it is highly unlikely that a topics course would have any significant overlap.
